alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 11:23AM EDT until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. Black River At Kingstree affecting Williamsburg County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina... Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. Lumber River 1 SE Nichols affecting Dillon, Horry and Marion Counties. Black Creek At Quinby affecting Florence and Darlington Counties. Little Pee Dee River At Galivants Ferry affecting Marion and Horry Counties. For the Northeast Cape Fear River...including Burgaw...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Little Pee Dee River...including Galivants Ferry...Major flooding is forecast. For the Black River...including Kingstree...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Pee Dee River at Galivants Ferry. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood waters will affect 30 to 40 homes in the Fork Retch community near Nichols. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by late tonight.
